Producer: Alison Dickey, Hunter Gray, Lynette Howell Taylor, Alex Orlovsky
Production Co: Venture Forth, KnowMore Productions, Verisimilitude, Periscope Entertainment, Silverwood Films, Live Free or Die Films
Rating: R (Sexual Content|Language|All Involving Teens|Some Drug and Alcohol Use)
Synopsis: Bullied and withdrawn, a large teen (Jacob Wysocki) finds a support system with other school misfits after a vice principal (John C. Reilly) brings him in for counseling.
Title: Terri
